s1.title: Communities
s1.p: The Cocoon community has decided to nurture child communities within the Cocoon sub-project.
These child communities have a more specific and narrow focus, and have non-specific access to only a subset of the Cocoon Sub-project resources.
Committers on the father Cocoon Sub-project have automatic full access to all the Cocoon Sub-project resources.

s1.title: Child Communities
s1.p: Currently the Cocoon Sub-project has the following child communities, with their specific goals, resource usage scope, and reference mailing list.
